member.name: T:Ichosoft.Extensions.Configuration.Cryptography.AESProvider
member.summary: Contains methods for working with AES encryption.

member.name: M:Ichosoft.Extensions.Configuration.Cryptography.AESProvider.GenerateKey(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a new symmetric key for encryption and decryption.
member.param: The size in bits for the generated key. Valid AES values are 128, 192, 256. The default is 256.
member.returns: The secret key with length of bits.

member.name: M:Ichosoft.Extensions.Configuration.Cryptography.AESProvider.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Encrypts the input string using the provided key.
member.param: The text to encrypt.
The symmetric key that is used for encryption and decryption.
The IV generated when the data was encrypted.
member.returns: The encrypted text.

member.name: M:Ichosoft.Extensions.Configuration.Cryptography.AESProvider.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts the input string using the provided key and IV.
member.param: The encrypted text.
The symmetric key that is used for encryption and decryption.
The IV generated when the data was encrypted.
member.returns: The decrypted text.

member.name: M:Ichosoft.Extensions.Configuration.Cryptography.AESProvider.Decrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts the input string with prepended IV using the given key.
member.param: The cipher text with the IV prepended.
The symmetric key that is used for encryption and decryption.
member.returns: The decrypted text.

member.name: M:Ichosoft.Extensions.Configuration.Cryptography.AESProvider.Encrypt(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Byte[]@)
member.summary: Encrypts the input data using the provided key.
member.param: The text to encrypt.
The symmetric key that is used for encryption and decryption.
The IV generated when the data was encrypted.
member.returns: The encrypted text as a byte array.

member.name: M:Ichosoft.Extensions.Configuration.Cryptography.AESProvider.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts the input data using the provided key and IV.
member.param: The data to decrypt.
The symmetric key that is used for encryption and decryption.
The IV generated when the data was encrypted.
member.returns: The decrypted data as a string.
